sections.heading: Repealed.Section 22-8D-2 - Repealed
sections.text:
History:Laws 2003, ch. 434, § 1; repealed by Laws 2005, ch. 292, § 9.

Repeals.— Laws 2005, ch. 292, § 9 repealed 22-8D-1 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 2003, ch. 434, § 1, the short title for Special Urban School District Act, effective July 1, 2005. For provisions of former section,seethe 2004 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.

sections.heading: Repealed.
